title.rendered: “Digiperform Is An Amazing Institute With Supportive Faculty And Great Ambience.” – Dhaarna Makkar

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Dhaarna Makkar, currently working as a Digital Marketing Executive in ‘Solutions Academy’. Being tech-savvy, she always had a keen interest in social media platforms even before joining dCDMC training at Digiperform. In a chit-chat session with us, she shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped her to understand the concept of online marketing and opt for the same to persist in her career as a digital marketer. Have a look!

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Dhaarna- Hi, I am Dhaarna Makkar, working in Solutions Academy as a Digital Marketing Executive. I am very grateful to Digiperform for providing my career a new identity through its innovative training program.  

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Dhaarna- As I am tech-savvy and have always been looking for the latest updates and solutions. Also, I am quite fascinated by the role – social media platforms are playing currently in marketing. And it encouraged me so much that I felt I should know about this field and be jumped in this field to take the knowledge.  

Digiperform- What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Dhaarna- Digiperform has in-depth knowledge about online marketing strategies. The LMS content is a unique blend of practical exercises, tests, assignments, and theoretical content that differentiate Digiperform from other digital marketing training institutes.  

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Dhaarna- I really had a great time while learning digital marketing at Digiperform. I would love to say thanks to my batchmates who made my learning journey very interesting and trainers who helped me a lot to make my learning successful in a very innovative way.  

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Dhaarna- Indeed, I would recommend Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital Marketing training.  

Digiperform- If you were to review our training program, what score would you give out of 10?

Dhaarna- I would give Digiperform, 10 out of 10.  

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Dhaarna- With full focus and determination, I would like to see myself as a Digital Marketing Head in the coming five years. Fingers Crossed!  

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Dhaarna- Join them, come in a league to give a great fight.  

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Dhaarna- Digiperform is an Amazing Institute with Supportive faculty and a Great ambiance. Thanks, Dhaarna for being part of the Digiperform family and sharing valuable experiences with us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
